original_text: But you must not eat any fruit from the tree that gives knowledge of good and evil. If you do eat fruit from that tree, that day you will certainly die.’
korean_text: 선악을 알게 하는 나무의 열매는 먹지 말라 네가 먹는 날에는 반드시 죽으리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: But you must not eat any fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 어떤 과일도 먹지 말아야 한다

sentences.original_text: from the tree that gives knowledge
If you do eat fruit from that tree,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 네가 그 나무의 과일을 먹는다면,

sentences.original_text: that day you will certainly die.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날 너는 반드시 죽을 것이다.'
